Class ElasticSearchOperations

    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Integer,java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel>>

  • public class ElasticSearchOperations
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Integer,java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel>>
    Handles all requests to and from the Elastic Search Servers Some code taken from PicPoster repo by zjullion and ESDemo
    Author:
    Team 01

        Pushes a comment model to ES servers
        Parameters:

        uuid - index that the model will be stored at
        URL - model is pushed to this URL
